attributes.action: allow the people a referendum on whether or not the BBC should continue to be funded through taxpayers contributions which are taken under threat of criminalisation.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Now that the web of individuals who can commit crimes of fraud and deception and then get the fines paid by the taxpayer is widening through the misguided plan to fund the private sector by handing over taxpayer pounds to ITN, it is now time for the taxpayer to be given an opportunity to voice an opinion on whether or not this questionable activity should continue to be funded by the taxpayer.
